## createEmptyApiSpec() function

Create an empty OpenApiSpec object that's still a valid openapi document.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createEmptyApiSpec(): OpenApiSpec;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`OpenApiSpec`
